div.pre: 2343 Cartella, c. 15 km. E of Figueras, 1867 (210) Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 30+ AR Emporiae: 30 dr. Disposition: unknown â€ Zobel y Zangroniz, MNE 1877-9, pp. 137-8 Amoros, Dracmes, p. 33 de Guadan, Numisma 16 (1955), p. 15; MPER, pp. 88-90
